displayProperties.description: "So word is one of the Cabal's drill engineers found another one of my caches. I don't know if I did such a good job sealing it or if those dumb rhino fingers are too fat to pry it open. Anyway, it's been spotted in some hole near that drill site. I guess Ghaul called them back before they could get into it." â€”Cayde-6
displayProperties.name: Io Treasure Map
